bwwExcerpt: Now, they‚Äôre playing on Broadway for the first time since its original production in an energetic, charming new staging from director Schele Williams. Cheers erupt. Charlie Smalls‚Äô score is packed with infectious grooves and the cast delivers some fine singing.
